SELECT P .address AS address, i.company_name AS companyName, o.order_no AS orderNo, P .create_time AS appointmentTime, po.sign_time AS signedTime, P .address_detail AS addressDetail,
co.money AS reducedContractAmount, o.order_stage AS orderStage, b.big_name AS constructionProgress, b.is_adopt AS checkCondition, d.delay_time AS delayDays
FROM designer_order o LEFT JOIN construction_order co ON co.project_no = o.project_no
LEFT JOIN project_delay d ON d.project_no = o.project_no LEFT JOIN project_big_scheduling_details b ON b.project_no = o.project_no LEFT JOIN company_info i ON i.company_id = o.company_id LEFT JOIN project P ON P .project_no = o.project_no LEFT JOIN pc_order_contract po ON po.order_number = o.order_no
WHERE o.project_no=#{projectOrderVO.projectNo} AND o.status=#{projectOrderVO.status} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC
limit #{pageSize} offset #{pageNum}
SELECT order_stage as taskStage, order_no as orderNo, style_type as styleType FROM designer_order WHERE project_no = #{projectNo}
SELECT ci.company_name AS constructionCompany FROM designer_order deso LEFT JOIN company_info ci ON deso.company_id = ci.company_id WHERE deso.project_no=#{projectNo} AND deso.status=#{status}

SELECT count(1) FROM designer_order dor LEFT JOIN project p ON p.project_no = dor.project_no LEFT JOIN pc_order_contract po ON po.order_number = dor.order_no LEFT JOIN province pr ON pr.province_code = p.province WHERE dor.company_id = #{designContractVO.companyId} AND dor.status = #{designContractVO.status}
and po.contract_number like CONCAT('%',#{designContractVO.contractNo},'%' )
and dor.order_no like CONCAT('%',#{designContractVO.orderNo},'%' )
and p.order_source like CONCAT('%',#{designContractVO.orderSource},'%' )
and pr.province_name like CONCAT('%',#{designContractVO.orderAddress},'%' )
and po.audit_type like CONCAT('%',#{designContractVO.auditType},'%' )
AND po.sign_time >= #{designContractVO.startSign} AND po.sign_time <=#{designContractVO.endSign}
and po.audit_type = '1' and po.sign_time > now()
and ( po.audit_type = '0' or po.sign_time < now() )
